title: Šibaniba
description: A settlement mentioned in Neo-Assyrian sources, Šibaniba is identified with the modern site of Tell Billa in Iraq. Although excavated in the early 20th century, very little was published about the archaeology of the site (but see now Creamer 2021).

properties.description: Representative location based on OpenStreetMap. Dates after Creamer 2021
properties.title: OSM location of Tell Billa
